Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus strain 21 (IC90=4 µg/mL), Staphylococcus aureus strain 4 (IC90=2-4 µg/mL).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Mutant of Def-DAA defensin (K8I,W11V,T14A) is active against sensitive and resistant strains of S. aureus. All the mutants are less toxic than Def-DAA except one (W11V) but are more toxic than Def-AcAA.

Literature.Title: Rational design of peptides active against the gram positive bacteria Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Landon C, Barbault F, Legrain M, Guenneugues M, Vovelle F.
